## Write data to source folder

```{r}
write.csv(penguins, file = "palmer-penguins.csv")
```

## Use example

No output in rendered document.

```{ojs}
//| echo: fenced
pdata = FileAttachment("palmer-penguins.csv").csv({typed: true})

Plot.plot({
  facet: {
    data: pdata,
    x: "sex",
    y: "species",
    marginRight: 80
  },
  marks: [
    Plot.frame(),
    Plot.rectY(pdata, 
      Plot.binX(
        {y: "count"}, 
        {x: "body_mass_g", thresholds: 20, fill: "species"}
      )
    ),
    Plot.tickX(pdata, 
      Plot.groupZ(
        {x: "median"}, 
        {x: "body_mass_g",
         z: d => d.sex + d.species,
         stroke: "#333",
         strokeWidth: 2
        }
      )
    )
  ]
})
```
